content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Regarding the setup required to start with the mobile testing, we need to keep in mind that this have many variables that depend on the project and we need to know before we can start with the setup. Some of these variables are:\\r\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"unordered-list\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"New Installation/Setup, Update Installation/Setup\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Application type of application (Native, Hybrid, Web)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Device type (Smart Phone, Tablet, Streaming Device, Wearable, …)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"list-item-child\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Connectivity (No connectivity required, Internet, WIFI, Bluetooth, GPS, …)\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"App Installation\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rFor the installation, sometimes we need to restore our devices to the default settings and that is easily done on the settings on our device, some other times, we only need to clear cache by deleting the previous applications before the installation. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rHere we are going to review the two most popular flavors of mobiles, iOS and Android and we will focus after the App installation, on what kind of connectivity is required for our testing. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIn order to start with the installation, we need to identify the format/package of our app. For iOS apps we can find IPA and APP extension files, for Android we find APK extension files.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\riOS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rCommonly, IPA files are found on App store or web sites. Previously we were able to install IPA downloaded files with iTunes, but this functionality was removed. Now we need to use some services from the web to upload our build and install it via Web browser on our devices. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":144476,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/10fc2489-8ff4-4f2e-a627-9e531fe2ee3f/app.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/10fc2489-8ff4-4f2e-a627-9e531fe2ee3f/app.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"app.png\",\"name\":\"app.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"10fc2489-8ff4-4f2e-a627-9e531fe2ee3f\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":218,\"height\":473},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After this, we can get a pop up when trying to open the app \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“Untrusted Enterprise Developer.\\\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":47789,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e200724-dd63-4e6b-9ffe-5885273ccc1e/app2.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e200724-dd63-4e6b-9ffe-5885273ccc1e/app2.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"app2.jpg\",\"name\":\"app2.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5e200724-dd63-4e6b-9ffe-5885273ccc1e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":330,\"height\":223},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In We only need to open XCode with the device connected via USB and go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Devices and the device screen, click on the “+” on INSTALLED APPS section. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":367251,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d250cd38-976d-486d-8bcb-aaca8136f3dc/appp2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d250cd38-976d-486d-8bcb-aaca8136f3dc/appp2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"appp2.png\",\"name\":\"appp2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d250cd38-976d-486d-8bcb-aaca8136f3dc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":884,\"height\":444},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"And select the application.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":348624,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/355728ee-fc72-4a91-bb92-dd7a8e71a8bc/appp3.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/355728ee-fc72-4a91-bb92-dd7a8e71a8bc/appp3.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"appp3.png\",\"name\":\"appp3.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"355728ee-fc72-4a91-bb92-dd7a8e71a8bc\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":878,\"height\":492},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Android\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rFor Android we can use Web services like with iOS, but this will be used only for our convenience because on Android we don’t have restrictions to install apps from unknown sources, we only need transfer the APK file to the device and allow the installation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rIf we haven’t allowed before, we are going to have a warning and we will be able to go to settings to allow the installation.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23843,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f4e9f20c-6f76-4e65-bb32-aa684db5c84e/andr.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/f4e9f20c-6f76-4e65-bb32-aa684db5c84e/andr.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"andr.jpg\",\"name\":\"andr.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"f4e9f20c-6f76-4e65-bb32-aa684db5c84e\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":248,\"height\":441},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Settings we navigate to Security and turn on Unknown sources.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":42232,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/03ad5799-0cc6-4a3c-8095-3e1c71a19b39/andr3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/03ad5799-0cc6-4a3c-8095-3e1c71a19b39/andr3.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"andr3.JPG\",\"name\":\"andr3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"03ad5799-0cc6-4a3c-8095-3e1c71a19b39\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":602,\"height\":497},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Also, we are able to install APK from command line if we have the Android SDK. We only need to connect our device via USB with Debug activated and run the command:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\radb install file.apk\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-italic\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"No Connectivity Required\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When we do not require any connectivity and the application can run locally, we only need to install the application to start our testing. At this point probably we will only require to debug once in a while, so let’s see how we can do that.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"iOS\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe traditional way when we need to debug apple devices is doing it from a Mac. We only need to install XCode and plug the phone via USB. Now also we can debug via WIFI and after we enable that on Mac XCode, we can also use this device on Windows Visual Studio (Devices should be connected on the same Network). \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe only need to open XCode with the device connected via USB and go to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Devices and Simulators.\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":216623,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/918e25f9-c9f6-44d5-a0a6-68f2d025bf10/dev.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/918e25f9-c9f6-44d5-a0a6-68f2d025bf10/dev.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"dev.png\",\"name\":\"dev.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"918e25f9-c9f6-44d5-a0a6-68f2d025bf10\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":789,\"height\":279},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Devices and Simulators window we only need to check the\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" Connect via network \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"option.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":167904,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0afd8123-e997-489a-a282-1031d653d38c/dev2.png?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/0afd8123-e997-489a-a282-1031d653d38c/dev2.png?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"dev2.png\",\"name\":\"dev2.png\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"0afd8123-e997-489a-a282-1031d653d38c\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":791,\"height\":237},\"extension\":\"png\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Android\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn Android, we need to enable debugging on the device itself. To do it, we first need to enable the Developer mode. These are the steps:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rWe need to navigate to \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Software Information \",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Settings\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" and start tapping on \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Build number\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" field. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":41007,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a73dbb7-a517-48e8-b7af-51181ce762e5/devv.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1a73dbb7-a517-48e8-b7af-51181ce762e5/devv.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"devv.JPG\",\"name\":\"devv.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1a73dbb7-a517-48e8-b7af-51181ce762e5\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":547,\"height\":527},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"We continue tapping until we get the confirmation that Developer mode is activated. After this we can find Developer Options at the bottom on Settings.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":41488,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e118c12-d559-433d-ac93-784ecbcc7bcd/devv2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9e118c12-d559-433d-ac93-784ecbcc7bcd/devv2.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"devv2.JPG\",\"name\":\"devv2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9e118c12-d559-433d-ac93-784ecbcc7bcd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":576,\"height\":540},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"On Developer Options we have many things settings we can use, but we need to scroll down to USB Debugging.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":45687,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1788e93d-f2f6-44c5-b3b3-057a589d7bfd/devv3.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1788e93d-f2f6-44c5-b3b3-057a589d7bfd/devv3.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"devv3.JPG\",\"name\":\"devv3.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1788e93d-f2f6-44c5-b3b3-057a589d7bfd\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":567,\"height\":522},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Now we only need to activate and allow USB debugging. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":70006,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a1eda0d5-8ef0-4481-851e-7951c88feeb7/dev9.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a1eda0d5-8ef0-4481-851e-7951c88feeb7/dev9.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"dev9.jpg\",\"name\":\"dev9.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a1eda0d5-8ef0-4481-851e-7951c88feeb7\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":236,\"height\":498},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Internet (WIFI and Cellular Network)\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rAt the present time, almost everything moves around Internet, so mobile applications too. We use it to have real time information and read/store data on the cloud. When our app needs Internet connection, sometimes our Testing Environments are not open to be accessed directly on Internet, in this case we need to use Proxies or VPN connections.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rFor Proxies, normally we can change those on the settings of our WIFI connection with the values that we required. For VPN connections most of the time we use apps like Cisco AnyConnect and Zscaler.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rThe configuration changes depending on the app, for example if our company uses Zscaler we only need to login with our credentials, as all the configuration should be done already by the infrastructure team.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":23481,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c45daeaa-b4f2-406b-b5bd-cb34610d4be6/int2.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c45daeaa-b4f2-406b-b5bd-cb34610d4be6/int2.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"int2.JPG\",\"name\":\"int2.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c45daeaa-b4f2-406b-b5bd-cb34610d4be6\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":253,\"height\":517},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"In the other hand, like on Cisco AnyConnect, we need to add the server address manually for the VPN Connection.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":35098,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/05d1122e-f7ea-41fd-b141-82c513e18dc8/sics.JPG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/05d1122e-f7ea-41fd-b141-82c513e18dc8/sics.JPG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"sics.JPG\",\"name\":\"sics.JPG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"concrete\":true,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"05d1122e-f7ea-41fd-b141-82c513e18dc8\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":577,\"height\":544},\"extension\":\"JPG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Other types of Connectivity (WIFI Direct, Bluetooth, GPS, …)\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"color\":\"#9BC837\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOne common connectivity that we often have to test are Phone calls and SMS.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"As applications require more security, many applications started using Multi-Factor authentication, in that case, is when we need Phone calls and SMS.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rOn this type of testing we need to keep in mind that in some occasions we could need a specific region carrier or phone number, for example if we are testing an application from a US client, we could need a US phone number for the registration. One way to solve this is requesting a US carrier SIM card or we can use a virtual number from a provider.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rSometimes we require to test other types of connectivity, like connection to other devices or services, for example:\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\rConnect our Phone to a Smartwatch, to a Sound device, to a Stick to Stream or enable GPS.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"These things are now part of daily life, and the only thing we need to do is configure them on our devices or install additional applications to monitor the connections/responses from a service or simulate GPS locations.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
